cards.name: In the Thick of It
cards.text:
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation.
When you accept this contract, suffer 2 total physical and/or mental trauma. Then, choose one card name. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: Hunted
cards.text: Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation. When you accept this contract, choose one card name. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign. Forced - When the first Mythos phase of the game begins: Reveal cards from the top of the encounter deck until you reveal an enemy. Draw that card. Shuffle the encounter deck.

cards.name: Isolated
cards.text:
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation and only if there is a single investigator in the campaign.
Choose one card name. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: See Beyond
cards.text:
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation.
When you accept this contract, add a random basic weakness to your deck. Then, choose a card cycle (such as Edge of the Earth.) That cycle is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: Student of the Veil
cards.text: Permanent. Limit 1 per campaign. Accept this contract only during deck creation. When you accept this contract, choose one card name. That card is added to your card dpool for the duration of this campaign. Forced - When the game begins: Search the encounter deck for a copy of Beyond the Veil and add it to your threat area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

cards.name: No One Left Behind
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract during Campaign creation. When you accept this contract, choose [per_investigator] cards. Those cards are added to the available card pool for the duration of this campaign. Forced - When the campaign begins: flip this card over.

cards.name: No One Left Behind
cards.text: Ultimatum. Forced - When given the option to add a story [[Ally]] to an investigator's deck, an investigator must add that card to their deck. Forced - When a story [[Ally]] is defeated: Record in your Campaign Log that "[Ally's name] was kidnapped." Then, remove that card from its owner's deck.

cards.name: The Other Side
cards.text: Permanent. Accept this contract only after completing Scenario III: The Essex Country Express, and only if you were not defeated. When you accept this contract, add a copy of the Across Space and Time weakness to your ddeck. Then, choose one card name. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: Suffer the Veil
cards.text: Permanent. Accept this contract only after completing Scenario III: The Essex County Express, and only if you were defeated. When you accept this contract, choose one card name. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign. Forced - After Across Time and Space is discarded from your deck: Shuffle Across Time and Space into your deck. Then, discard the top card of your deck.

cards.name: The Father's Hunger
cards.text: Permanent. Accept this contract only before Scenario IV: Blood on the Altar. Cards you name with the triggered ability on the other side of this card are added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign. Forced - When Blood on the Altar begins: Flip this card over.

cards.name: The Father's Hunger
cards.text:
Ultimatum.
[reaction] After the agenda advances: Speak the name of a card aloud. Then, choose one of the potential sacrifices at random and place it underneath the agenda deck without looking at it.

cards.name: The Wisdom of Ibn-Ghazi
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract only after Interlude II: The Survivors. When you accept this contract, choose one card name. That card is added to the available card pool for the duration of this campaign. Then, if the Powder of Ibn-Ghazi is in any investigator's deck, remove it from their deck.

cards.name: Legacy of Dunwich
cards.text:
[reaction] When you complete the Dunwich Legacy CPA: Announce your completion in the Mythos Busters Discord server. The next time you participate in a CPA, you may accept this contract.
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation. When you accept this contract, choose one card from the Dunwich Legacy expansion. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: Act 1...
cards.text: Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation. When you accept this contract, suffer 1 mental trauma. Then, earn 1 experience and choose one card name. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign. Forced - When given the option, you must accept Act II.

cards.name: Whispers of Hastur
cards.text: Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation. When you accept this contract, choose one card name. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign. Forced - When the game begins: Look at cards from the top of the encounter deck until you look at a treachery with the hidden keyword and add it to your hand. Shuffle the encounter deck.

cards.name: Dressed to Impress
cards.text: Permanent. Accept this contract only before Scenario II: The Last King. Add one copy of Fine Clothes to your deck (it does not count against your deck size or deck-building restrictions.) Forced - When the game begins: When the game begins, flip this card over.

cards.name: Dressed to Impress
cards.text: Permanent. Forced - When the game begins: Search your deck, hand, and discard for a copy of Fine Clothes and put it into play. Forced - Non-direct damage must be assigned to Fine Clothes before it can be assigned to your investigator card. Forced - When Fine Clothes leaves play, exile it and you earn 2 fewer experience for this scenario. Then, exile this contract.

cards.name: Final Curtains?
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract only after resolving Interlude I and only if you slayed the monsters at the dinner party. Choose one investigator to add a copy of Kerosene and a copy of Matchbox to their deck for the remainder of the campaign (these cards do not cost experience or count towards deck size and ignore deckbuilding restrictions.) Then, erase all names listed under VIPs Slain. Forced - When the game begins: Flip this card over.

cards.name: Encore!
cards.text:
Ultimatum.
[reaction] When you resolve the [action] ability on Kerosene during a round and at the location in which Constance Dumaine, Jordan Perry, Ishimaru Haruko, Sebastien Moreau, or Ashleigh Clarke was added to the Victory Display: Add this card to the Victory Display.

cards.name: Gifts of Madness
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract only before Scenario IV: The Unspeakable Oath. Check the Campaign Log. - If you took the onyx clasp, the investigator whos deck contains the Clasp of Black Onyx must include The Tattered Cloak in their deck (does not count towards deck size). - Otherwise, one investigator must include the Clasp of Black Onyx weakness in their deck (does not count towards deck size). That investigator chooses a card name and adds it to their card pool.

cards.name: Lucidity
cards.text: Accept this contract only immediately after being driven insane while resolving Investigator Defeat at the conclusion of Scenario IV: The Unspeakable Oath. When you accept this contract, your investigator is no longer insane. Add a random basic weakness to your deck and record the name of that card in your Campaign Log. Go to Resolution 3. Then, flip this card over.

cards.name: Mental Chains
cards.text: Permanent. Forced - During Setup: Gather both copies of Straitjacket from The Unspeakable Oath encounter set and set them aside, out of play. Forced - When you draw the card recorded in your Campaign Log, cancel that card's effects and discard it. Then, put a set aside copy of Straitjacket into play in your threat area. Forced - When Straitjacket is discarded from play, set it aside, out of play.

cards.name: Straitjacket
cards.text: Revelation - If there is no copy of Straitjacket in your threat area, put Straitjacket into play in your threat area as an asset that takes up a body slot and 2 hand slots. Return each asset in those slots to your hand. This card cannot leave play except by the ability below. [action] [action]: Discard Straitjacket.

cards.name: Act II
cards.text: Permanent. You may only accept this contract at the conclusion of Interlude II and only if you accepted Act I... during deck creation. When you accept this contract, earn 2 additional experience as you gain insight into the machinations of the Tattered King. Then, search the collection for a random basic [[Madness]] or [[Pact]] weakness and add it to your deck (does not count toward deck size). If your Campaign Guide later requires an investigator to read Act II, you are considered to have fulfilled this requirement and cannot do so again.

cards.name: He is already here.
cards.text: Permanent. Accept this contract only after Scenario V: A Phantom of Truth and only if you heeded Daniel's warning. You must immediately purchase one level 0-3 [[Insight]] card (ignoring deckbuilding restrictions). It does not count towards your deck size. Purcahsing a level 0 card in this way does not cost you experience. Forced: If you would take 1 horror due to speaking the name of HASTUR aloud, draw an encounter card instead.

cards.name: The Path is Open.
cards.text: Black Stars Rise (The Path to Carcosa Campaign) During setup, you may add up to 2 [cultist], [tablet], and/or [elder_thing] tokens to the chaos bag, to a maximum of 2 of each token in the chaos bag. - For each [cultist] added to the chaos bag: mark one Conviction in your Campaign Log. - For each [tablet] added to the chaos bag: mark one Doubt in your Campaign Log. - For each [elder_thing] added to the chaos bag: erase one Doubt or Conviction in your Campaign Log.

cards.name: The Path Between
cards.text: Dim Carcosa (The Path to Carcosa Campaign) - When gathering cards during setup, gather Garden from Unspeakable Oath. - Regardless of whether you opened the path below or you opened the path above, each investigator begins play at Garden instead. - If you remember that you "distracted the guards" during this scenario, each investigator may search their deck for a card and add it to their hand.

cards.name: Memories of Carcosa
cards.text:
[reaction] When you complete the Path to Carcosa CPA: Announce your completion in the Mythos Busters Discord server. The next time you participate in a CPA, you may accept this contract.
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation. When you accept this contract, choose one card from the Path to Carcosa expansion. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: Gourmand
cards.text: Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation. When you accept this contract, add Fine Clothes to your card pool for the duration of this campaign. Forced - When presented with the option, you must keep eating and finish your meal.

cards.name: The Colour of the Vale
cards.text:
[reaction] When you complete the Feast of Hemlock Vale CPA: Announce your completion in the Mythos Busters Discord server. The next time you participate in a CPA, you may accept this contract.
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation. When you accept this contract, choose one card from the Feast of Hemlock Vale expansion. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: Fish and Loaves
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract only during campaign creation. If you are playing The Innsmouth Conspiracy, add all cards with the [[Blessed]] and [[Cursed]] trait from The Feast of Hemlock Vale to the available card pool, or vice-versa. Forced - After choosing investigators, flip this card over.

cards.name: Fish and Loaves
cards.text: Ultimatum. Choose one investigator to become the bearer of the Dread Curse weakness (does not count towards deck size). For the remainder of this campaign, any time the bearer of the Dread Curse leaves the campaign for any reason, choose a new investigator to become the bearer of the Dread Curse weakness, and add it to that investigator's deck. Forced - After opening hands are drawn: Add 5 [curse] tokens to the chaos bag.

cards.flavor:
"In his house at R'lyeh dead Cthulhu waits dreaming."
- H.P. Lovecraft, The Call of Cthulhu
cards.name: Dreams from R'lyeh
cards.text:
Boon. Accept this contract at any time.
Add all previewed cards from The Drowned City to the card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: Into the Rabbit Burrow
cards.text: Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation. When you accept this contract, add all other cards with the same title as a card in the CPA card pool to your card pool for the duration of this campaign. Forced - When the game begins: Shuffle the top two cards of the Tekeli-li deck into your deck without looking at them (for each card you cannot shuffle, take 1 direct horror).

cards.name: Dogs Will Keep You Warm
cards.text: Permanent. Limit 1 per campaign. Accept this contract only during deck creation. When you accept this contract, your investigator gains: "Additional Requirements: Your deck must include at least 8 cards with animals in them." [fast] If there are at least 3 [frost] tokens in the chaos bag, exhaust Dogs Will Keep You Warm: remove a [frost] token from the chaos bag. (Max once per campaign.)
cards.traits: Contract. Composure. Edge of the Earth.

cards.name: The Raven Lord's Gambit
cards.text:
Ultimatum. Accept this contract during Campaign creation. When you accept this contract, remove Stand Together from the available card pool for the duration of this campaign.
[reaction] When the scenario ends, if an investigator had Scrying Mirror in play: Add this card to the Victory Display.
cards.traits: Contract. Ultimatum. Gambit. Edge of the Earth.

cards.name: "It's Not Your Time!"
cards.text: Boon. Accept this contract during Campaign creation. [reaction] After you randomly choose a member of the Expedition Team: Cancel that choice, set that character aside, and choose again. Then, an investigator searches the collection for a random basic [[Flaw]], [[Injury]], or [[Madness]] weakness, and adds it to their deck.
cards.traits: Contract. Boon. Omen. Edge of the Earth.

cards.name: Hell Frozen Over
cards.text: Permanent. Uses (0 icicles). Forced - After you resolve a [frost] or [auto_fail] token during a skill test you are performing, exhaust Hell Frozen Over: Place 1 icicle on Hell Frozen Over. Forced - When the game ends, if there are 4 or more icicles on Hell Frozen over: In your Campaign Log, mark 1 progress under this Task.
cards.traits: Task. Incomplete. Edge of the Earth.

cards.name: Hell Frozen Over
cards.text: Permanent. Until this task has been completed, it enters play with its weakness side faceup. [reaction] After you reveal a [frost] token during a skill test you are performing: Cancel that token and seal it here. Reveal a new chaos token. Forced - At the end of the round, release all tokens sealed on Hell Frozen Over.
cards.traits: Task. Complete. Edge of the Earth.

cards.name: Crest the Summit
cards.text: Permanent. Uses (0 triumph). Forced - When you succeed at a skill test by 3 or more, place 1 triumph on Crest the Summit. Forced - When the game ends, if there are 7 or more triumph on Crest the Summit: In your Campaign Log, mark 1 progress under this Task.
cards.traits: Task. Incomplete. Edge of the Earth.

cards.name: Crest the Summit
cards.text:
Permanent. Until this task has been completed, it enters play with its weakness side faceup.
[reaction] When you succeed at a skill test, exhaust Crest the Summit: You succeed by up to 2 more.
cards.traits: Task. Complete. Edge of the Earth.

cards.name: Jack of All Trades
cards.text: Permanent. Uses (0 provisions). Forced - When an asset is played under your control, if that card has a class that does not match a class among non-permanent cards you control, place one provision on Jack of All Trades for each class that does not match. Forced - When the game ends, if there are 4 or more provisions on Jack of All Trades: In your Campaign Log, mark 1 progress under this Task.
cards.traits: Task. Incomplete. Edge of the Earth.

cards.name: Jack of All Trades
cards.text:
Permanent. Until this task has been completed, it enters play with its weakness side faceup.
You may take an additional action during your turn, which may only be used to play a multiclass card.
cards.traits: Task. Complete. Edge of the Earth.

cards.name: Better Part of Valour
cards.text: Permanent. Uses (0 escapes). Forced - After you leave a location with one or more enemies and enter an empty location, place 1 escape on Better Part of Valour. Forced - When the game ends, if there are 4 or more escapes on Better Part of Valour: In your Campaign Log, mark 1 progress under this Task.
cards.traits: Task. Incomplete. Edge of the Earth.

cards.name: Better Part of Valour
cards.text:
Permanent. Until this task has been completed, it enters play with its weakness side faceup.
[reaction] When an enemy enters your location: Immediately move to a connecting location, ignoring any additional costs (The enemy still enters your previous location.)
cards.traits: Task. Complete. Edge of the Earth.

cards.name: Waste Not, Want Not
cards.text: Permanent. Forced - After an entry is written in "Supplies Recovered" or an Expedition asset is added to any investigator's deck: In your Campaign Log, mark 1 progress under this Task.
cards.traits: Task. Incomplete. Edge of the Earth.

cards.name: Waste Not, Want Not
cards.text: Permanent. Until this task has been completed, it enters play with its weakness side faceup. [reaction] When the game begins: Each investigator may search their deck for one story asset from the Memorials of the Lost encounter set and play it at no cost. Forced - Your Expedition assets enter paly with 2 additional uses.
cards.traits: Task. Complete. Edge of the Earth.

cards.name: Memento Mori
cards.text: Permanent. Forced - After an entry is written in "Memories Banished": In your Campaign Log, mark 1 progress under this Task.
cards.traits: Task. Incomplete. Edge of the Earth.

cards.name: Memento Mori
cards.text: Permanent. Until this task has been completed, it enters play with its weakness side faceup. [reaction] When the game begins: Each investigator may search their deck for one story asset from the Memorials of the Lost encounter set and play it at no cost. Forced - Your Partner asset gains +1 health, +1 sanity, and you ignore the effects of Miasmatic Torment.
cards.traits: Task. Complete. Edge of the Earth.
